SEARCH
Package org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.tool

Klasse ToolEnvironment

java.lang.Object
org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.tool.ToolEnvironment
public class ToolEnvironment extends Object
Holds the environment for a run of javadoc.

Holds only the information needed throughout the run and not the compiler info that could be GC’ed or ported.
